protocol.name: P-AFFY-12
text: This document describes Affymetrix recommended labeling protocols for use with GeneChip Exon Arrays.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-17741
protocol.text: Total RNAs were extracted using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen). The total RNA samples were pretreated with an RNase-free DNase I and cleaned up using the Plant Total RNA Isolation Kit (Qiagen). (Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = none)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-17742
protocol.text: Plants were grown on 1/2 X Murashige and Skoog-agar plates at 22C under long day conditions (16-h light and 8-h dark). White light illumination (120 micro mol photons m-2s-1) was provided by fluorescent FLR40D/A tubes (Osram, Seoul, Korea).(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)
